Address.value: 26600 TELEGRAPH ROAD,SUITE 400, SOUTHFIELD, Michigan, 48033, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Superior Industries International Inc is engaged in the design and manufacture of aluminum wheels for sale to OEMs in North America and Europe and to the aftermarket in Europe. The company's OEM aluminum wheels are primarily sold for factory installation on vehicle models manufactured by BMW (including Mini), Daimler (Mercedes-Benz, AMG, Smart), Ford, GM, Honda, Jaguar-Land Rover, Lucid Motors, Mazda, Nissan, PSA, Renault, Stellantis, Subaru, Suzuki, Toyota, VW Group (Volkswagen, Audi, SEAT, Skoda, Porsche, Bentley) and Volvo.

value.name: Michael Dorah
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
